description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Try it now. Bring back color to the world! The colorless enemies have arrived and they want to turn you the last color fighter into one of them. It is up to you to put color back into them in order to save your world! Featuring fast paced twin stick shooter action, this game will keep your heart pounding throughout the whole game.
description.short: Try it now. Bring back color to the world! The colorless enemies have arrived and they want to turn you the last color fighter into one of them.
